DOC.brief_summary: This study examine bioequivalence Dr. Reddy 's Omeprazole delay release capsule fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Omeprazole Delayed Release ( DR ) Capsules Bioequivalence Study Dr. Reddys Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , single dose , crossover bioequivalence study compare Omeprazole 40 mg Delayed Release Capsules ( Dr.Reddy 's Laboratories Ltd. , ) Prilosec® 40 mg ( Omeprazole Delayed Release Capsules ( manufacture Merck & Co. , Inc. , USA ) 44 healthy , adult , human subject fast condition .
DOC.criteria: Subjects provide write informed consent . Subjects healthy within 1845 year age , weigh least 50 kg . Body mass index ≥ 18 kglm2 ≤ 25 kg/m2 , body weight less 50 kg . Subjects normal health determine medical history physical examination perform within 15 day prior commencement study ( dose periodI ) . Subjects normal ECG , chest Xray ( PA view ) vital sign . Availability subject entire study period willingness adhere protocol requirement evidence write informed consent . Test product , dose , mode administration batch number
